{
   "Statement":[{
      "Effect":"Allow",
      "Action":["route53:ListResourceRecordSets", "route53:ChangeResourceRecordSets"],
      "Resource":"arn:aws:route53:::hostedzone/myzoneid"
      }
   ],
   "Statement":[{
      "Effect":"Allow",
      "Action":["route53:GetChange"],
      "Resource":"arn:aws:route53:::change/*"
      }
   ],
   "Statement":[{
      "Effect":"Allow",
      "Action":["route53:ListHostedZones"],
      "Resource":"*"
      }
   ]
}
